item.title: Alfred Notes
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: How to use node on alfred workflow node<<-"code" // your code here // e.g. console.log("hello world"); code iTerm2 Integration curl --silent 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stuartcryan/custom-iterm-applescripts-for-alfred/master/custom_iterm_script_iterm_2.9.applescript' | pbcopy stuartcryan/custom-iterm-applescripts-for-alfred: Custom iTerm Applescripts for Alfred
